Rebound-API documentationÂ¶

The Rebound API is a mock version of a real proprietary API and RFID-driven platform used for realtime inventory tracking in remote mining and oil & gas production locations. It is intended as a documentation portfolio piece only and has been scrubbed of certain details for security purposes.

Note

This project is under active development.
